```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r theme_gdocs, cache = TRUE}
dsamp <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]
(d <- qplot(carat, price, data=dsamp, colour=clarity)
 + theme_gdocs()
 + ggtitle("Diamonds")
 + scale_color_gdocs())



```
